'''Avetta''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A particularly unsympathetic captain of the Vailian Trading Company, Avetta is known for punishing her sailors with flogging for the smallest of transgressions  and treating them like her own personal servants. She's also quick to consider any criticism as a personal offense.

## Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved =[Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Sealed Fate](/sealedFate/): She is the target of a Principi plot.
